channel.title: Colin Carrie
channel.description: Recent news about Colin Carrie, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: With Liz, Sandra at Ribfest down at the Lake #Oshawa. Thx to Rotary Volunteers. Come on down! http://t.co/SO5eP5PX3S

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Stats Canada announced that +59,200 net new jobs were created in Aug. The unemployment rate fell-0.1% to a near post-recession low of 7.1%.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Congrats to #UOIT on their win against #DC in the Campus Cup Game! Great to see good ol'fashioned sports rivalry is alive and well! #Oshawa

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Lots of new faces tonight at the welcoming of #DC & #UOIT Int'l students!! Welcome to all new #Oshawa students!! http://t.co/DyLdujaV2z

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Happy New Year to my Jewish Friends. Enjoy celebrating Rosh Hashanah #Oshawa !!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Today, The World Economic Forum ranked Canada's financial system as the safest and soundest in the world for the 6th year in a row #Oshawa
